entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
